text.text_translated:
We looked at the facts. We recommend Girox Foods should have a management style that helps people.
They should find ways to give workers hours that can change. They should also help workers work from places they choose.
Managers should think of ways to challenge staff. They should also praise staff for their good work.
Girox Foods should put more money into training. This training is 'professional development'. It helps workers talk well with people from different countries and cultures. This training can help make a good place to work so workers can do their best work.

This simplification loses the specific nuances of 'reinforcement' (encouraging specific behaviors) and 'recognition' (formal acknowledgment), which are distinct from general 'praise'. best_attempt.text_translated:
We looked at some facts. We advise Girox Foods. They should lead their workers in a new way. This way is more about people.

They should find ways to give workers flexible hours. Workers can choose when to work. They should also think about how workers can work from different places. Workers can choose where to work.

Managers need to give workers new tasks. These tasks should be hard. Managers must also say "good job" more. They must praise workers for their work.

Girox Foods should spend more money on training for workers' jobs. This is professional development. This training is for talking with people. It is also for talking with people from other countries. This will help make a good place to work. Workers can then do their best work.
